review_title: A nice place to enjoy the view
review_body: We stopped at this nice city park to enjoy the overlook of the Aneseong River estuary. While we were there, we had the great fortune of listening to a solo guitarist playing Korean folk songs. The very tidy park is adjacent to a maritime museum/dock with WWII warships, and is adjacent to a large fish market. The kids got a kick out of watching the vendors hawk crabs, clams, and eels. It was a nice cultural trip.
